title: Jet boats in New Zealand
brief_description: Jet boats found in various parts of New Zealand. A New Zealand inventor demonstrates his jet boats on the beautiful lake, Manapouri; water skiers skim behind jet boats in Lyttelton Harbour; the twin jet ‘Rangimarie’ takes tourists up the Wanganui River and jet-boaters shoot the rapids and shallows of the Waimakariri River.
